# Tender Notice
## Tender Title
MOUNT, VERT LIVE (PN: 427-310-201-107)

## Reference Number
PW-CAG-010-28897

## Publication Date
2022-12-22

## Tender Closing Date
2023-01-23 14:00:00

## Tender Status
Expired

## Description
This tender is for the procurement of the "MOUNT, VERT LIVE" (PN: 427-310-201-107) for the Bell 429 aircraft, in support of Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD). This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) open to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for procurement of T8493-140035 series.

## Eligible Suppliers
The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Supplies Inc
* Non-Destructive Testing Products Ltd
* Bell Textron Canada (Contracts)
* Dart Aerospace
* Maxcraft Avionics Ltd.
* MHD Rockland
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Ltd.
* Pole Air Aviation
* Simex Defence Inc
* Szabo Aviation
* Textron Aviation 
* Tower Aerospace
* Tulmar Safety
* Unisource Technology Inc
* Zepoli International Inc
* PHP Canada
* BSF International Inc
* Helitrades Inc
* Field Aviation
* Alpine Aerotech
* JHT Defense
* Kadex Aero Supply
* National Helicopters
* Newcastle Aviation Partners LLC
* Optima Aero 
* Southeast Aerospace
* Canada West Avionics
* Skyline Helicopter Technologies
* Eagle Copters
* Genaire LTD
* Kitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center)
* Tronosjet Maintenance
* Aero Technical Components
* Arnprior Aerospace
* Pratt & Whitney Canada
* Bristow Instruments (1977) Ltd
* CASP Aerospace Inc

## Delivery Requirements
Delivery shall be made to Transport Canada, 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or to submit a proposal, please contact:
